TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewCellValidatingEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

summary.span: 为 控件的 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 活动，你可以取消对当前单元格的更改时的新值不是有效。The event lets you cancel changes to the current cell when the new value is not valid. 使用属性来确定当前值。Use the property to determine the current value. 若要确定当前的单元格的状态，请使用并属性访问通过的单元格集合。To determine the state of the current cell, use the and properties to access the cell through the collection. 若要取消更改，请设置属性设置为`true`。To cancel the change, set the property to `true`. 取消此事件时在数据绑定模式下，新值未推送到基础数据源。When this event is canceled in data-bound mode, the new value is not pushed to the underlying data source. 当处于虚拟模式下，取消此事件不会引发事件。When this event is canceled in virtual mode, the event will not be raised. ## Examples 下面的代码示例处理事件，以确保仅正整数由用户输入。The following code example handles the event to ensure that only positive integers are entered by the user. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供参考主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CPP/virtual.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CS/virtual.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/VB/virtual.vb#40)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ColumnIndex As Integer
public: property int ColumnIndex { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取需要验证的单元格的列索引。

span.span: Gets the column index of the cell that needs to be validated.

value.span: 从零开始的整数，它指定需要验证的单元格的列索引。

span.span: A zero-based integer that specifies the column index of the cell that needs to be validated.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example illustrates the use of this property. 此示例中提供一个更大示例摘自[如何： 验证 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的数据](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-validate-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Validate Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-validate-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataValidation#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataValidation/CS/datavalidation.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataValidation#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataValidation/VB/datavalidation.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FormattedValue As Object
public: property System::Object ^ FormattedValue { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取需要验证的单元格的已设置格式的内容。

span.span: Gets the formatted contents of the cell that needs to be validated.

value.span: 已设置格式的值的引用。

span.span: A reference to the formatted value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过用户界面 (UI) 用户输入的文本将成为属性值。The text entered by the user through the user interface (UI) becomes the property value. 这是可验证的值的单元格中分析之前属性值。This is the value that you can validate before it is parsed into the cell property value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例处理事件，以确保仅正整数由用户输入。The following code example handles the event to ensure that only positive integers are entered by the user. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供参考主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CPP/virtual.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CS/virtual.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/VB/virtual.vb#40)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RowIndex As Integer
public: property int RowIndex { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取需要验证的单元格的行索引。

span.span: Gets the row index of the cell that needs to be validated.

value.span: 从零开始的整数，它指定需要验证的单元格的行索引。

span.span: A zero-based integer that specifies the row index of the cell that needs to be validated.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example illustrates the use of this property. 此示例中提供一个更大示例摘自[如何： 验证 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的数据](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-validate-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Validate Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-validate-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataValidation#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataValidation/CS/datavalidation.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataValidation#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataValidation/VB/datavalidation.vb#20)]
